_xResult.title: Ramona Ruffle Dress
_xResult.longdesc:
This Ramona dress by Samshek conveys simplicity and nonchalance through its clean lines and looser silhouette. The textured sleeves betray your gorgeous sense of fashion.  The soft cotton fabric is breathable and light. 

 

Make sure to deal in contrasts when it comes to this dress. Give it bright jewelry and a pair of vibrant heels. Or, go all in on the comfort and casualness and throw on a pair of cool sneakers. 

 

Remember all the customization options below! Feel free to change whatever you'd like to create the perfect dress for yourself. For your reference, the model in the images shown is wearing a dress with the following options: round neck, short sleeve, above knee length, white fabric.
